name: SaaS Application
description: Multi-tenant SaaS platform with subscriptions, teams, and role-based permissions

customIssues.title: Implement Multi-Tenancy
customIssues.description: Tenant isolation with separate schemas or row-level security

customIssues.title: Create Subscription System
customIssues.description: Plans, billing, and subscription management with Stripe

customIssues.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
customIssues.description: Roles and permissions system with granular access control

customIssues.title: Create API Key Management
customIssues.description: API keys for third-party integrations with rate limiting

customIssues.title: Build Admin Dashboard
customIssues.description: Analytics, user management, and system monitoring

customIssues.title: Implement Onboarding Flow
customIssues.description: User onboarding with setup wizard and tutorials
